findings.title: ST - Stops Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner can stop transactions for all users excluding the owner.

findings.title: OTUT - Transfers User's Tokens
findings.description: Any user has the authority to transfer the balance of a userâ€™s contract to other addresses.

findings.title: ZD - Zero Division
findings.description: The contract is using variables that may be set to zero as denominators.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed, but the contract does not conform to it.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.
